name: TrialWerk
description:
A game about learning how to dance in a perplexing office-based deadline environment.

This rather small domain is overflowing with layers of living systems, functioning like a speed dating event held on your first day at work. While trying to make the best first impression, the feedback they receive leads the main character through a series of curious situations with their colleagues. 

TrialWerk is an experimental narrative in the form of an exploration game, featuring intertwined characters, objects and landscapes.  A game by Josh Crowle and Mario Mu.
